summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FASE 2 Judicial Agreement System. Backend fully functional with all new features working correctly. Frontend has critical React DOM compatibility issues preventing form dialogs from opening, blocking case/agreement/alvará creation through UI.

ui_bugs.component: Dialog Components (Case Creation, Agreement Creation, Alvará Creation)
ui_bugs.issue: React DOM compatibility error: 'reactDom.findDOMNode is not a function'
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents users from creating new cases, agreements, or alvarás through UI forms
ui_bugs.root_cause: React 19 compatibility issues with UI libraries (likely @radix-ui components or react-input-mask)

passed_tests: Backend: All 61 API tests passed (100% success rate)
Authentication with test credentials (advogado@teste.com / senha123)
FASE 2 Case fields: numero_processo, data_protocolo, status_processo, data_matricula, cpf, curso
Case CRUD operations via API
Agreement creation with entrada (with/without alvará)
Automatic parcel calculation: (total - entrada) / parcelas
Automatic first due date calculation (entrada + 1 month)
Entry via Alvará creates automatic alvará record
Alvará CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Total received calculation including: parcelas pagas + alvarás + entrada
Receipts endpoint with all filters (período, beneficiário, tipo)
KPIs calculation (total, por beneficiário 31/14, por tipo)
Monthly consolidation with chart data
Frontend: Login/logout functionality
Frontend: Cases listing and display
Frontend: Search and filtering (debtor name, agreement status, beneficiary, process status)
Frontend: Navigation between pages (Cases ↔ Recebimentos)
Frontend: Tab navigation (Acordo, Parcelas, Alvará Judicial, Resumo)
Frontend: Currency formatting (BRL - R$)
Frontend: Date formatting (dd/mm/aaaa)
Frontend: Beneficiary extraction and display (31/14)
Frontend: Recovery percentage calculation and display
Frontend: Status badges and visual indicators

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (Navigation and display working, forms blocked by React errors)
success_percentage.integration: 85% (API integration working, UI forms not functional)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix React DOM compatibility issues preventing form dialogs from opening. Error: 'reactDom.findDOMNode is not a function'. Likely caused by React 19 compatibility with @radix-ui components or react-input-mask. Consider downgrading React to 18.x or updating incompatible libraries. This blocks all case/agreement/alvará creation through UI.
